atlantis_talk_02_friend_01a: I...I almost never saw my mom in my whole life.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_01b: I...I almost never saw my dad in my whole life.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_botan_01: Oh? Is it time for the backstory reveal?[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_02:
[VAR 1107(00FF,0102)]ShHe was always busy with work.
Hardly ever came home.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_03:
I cooked for myself, cleaned for myself...
Mabosstiff was the only one I had to talk to.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_03a:
So, yeah, I don’t really know her at all. Even if
she is my mom.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_03b:
So, yeah, I don’t really know him at all. Even if
he is my dad.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_04a:
I tried not to think too much about it. Tried to
just be proud that she was this famous genius.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_04b:
I tried not to think too much about it. Tried to
just be proud that he was this famous genius.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_05:
But the truth is, I would’ve rather just had a [VAR 1107(00FF,0303)]momdad
who was there...even if [VAR 1107(00FF,0001)]she wasn’t anything great.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_06:
I haven’t seen h[VAR 1107(00FF,0202)]erim for ages now. Unless you count
seeing h[VAR 1107(00FF,0202)]erim in the news or whatever.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_07:
Used to at least get emails sometimes.
But even those stopped a couple years ago.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_08:
And then there [VAR 1107(00FF,0001)]she appears, out of the blue, and
tells me we’ve gotta come to Area Zero? Tch.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_botan_04: We’re not here to judge or anything...[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_02_botan_05:
And...I’m sorry about earlier. I shouldn’t have
snapped at you like that...[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_10:
Naw, I was also giving you a hard time.
Sorry...uh...[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_friend_11:
You know...you’re actually pretty nice for a little
pipsqueak![VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_02_botan_07: Heh... Don’t call me pipsqueak, you big lunk.[VAR 0114(0008)]
